articles.title: U.N. investigators say Israel committing 'genocide' in Gaza; Israel rejects 'distorted and false report'
articles.description: A United Nations Commission of Inquiry concluded on Tuesday that Israel has committed genocide in Gaza and that top Israeli officials, including Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, had incited these acts. The commission cited the scale of killings, aid blockages, forced displacement, and the destruction of a fertility clinic to support its finding. Israel has categorically rejected the report as "distorted and false."

articles.title: Trump announces another lethal strike on alleged Venezuelan drug boat
articles.description: President Trump announced another lethal strike against a Venezuelan boat, posting a video that he claims shows the moment U.S. military forces carried out the strike in international waters, killing three individuals described as "narot terrorists" transporting illegal narcotics. This is the second such strike in recent weeks amid rising tensions between Venezuela and the U.S.

articles.title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting not cooperating with authorities, says Utah Governor
articles.description: Utah Governor Spencer Cox stated that the suspect in the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk, 22-year-old Tyler Robinson, is not cooperating with authorities. Robinson was arrested on suspicion of aggravated murder and obstruction of justice. The incident has led to renewed focus on security for government officials, with the Trump administration requesting additional funding for protections.
